<section class="hp-banner overlay center">
    <picture>
        <source media="(min-width: 81.25em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/1360x453">
        <source media="(min-width: 57.563em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/1299x433">
        <source media="(min-width: 48em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/920x306">
        <source media="(min-width: 23.438em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/767x511">
        <img src="https://via.placeholder.com/374x249" alt="descriptive alt text here">
    </picture>

    <div class="text ">
        <div>
            <h2>Overlay Center</h2>
            <p>Some descriptive text here.</p>
            <a href="#" class="btn primary-cta">Shop Now</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
 
<section class="hp-banner {{position-classes}}" {{#if bkgd}}style="background-color: {{bkgd-color}};"{{/if}}>
    {{#if overlay}}
        <picture>
            <source media="(min-width: 81.25em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/1360x453">
            <source media="(min-width: 57.563em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/1299x433">
            <source media="(min-width: 48em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/920x306">
            <source media="(min-width: 23.438em)" srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/767x511">
            <img src="https://via.placeholder.com/374x249" alt="descriptive alt text here">
        </picture>
    {{else}}
        <div>
            <img srcset="https://via.placeholder.com/767x511 767w,
                         https://via.placeholder.com/680x453 680w,
                         https://via.placeholder.com/374x249 374w
                        "
                 sizes="(min-width: 48em) 50vw,
                        (min-width: 23.438em) 100vw
                       "
                 src="https://via.placeholder.com/374x249"
                 alt="descriptive alt text here">
        </div>
    {{/if}}

    <div class="text {{#if bkgd}}bkgd{{/if}}" {{#if bkgd}}{{#if overlay}}style="background-color: {{bkgd-color}};"{{/if}}{{/if}}>
        <div>
            <h2>{{title}}</h2>
            <p>{{description}}</p>
            <a href="#" class="btn {{button-class}}">Shop Now</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
 
{
  "title": "Overlay Center",
  "description": "Some descriptive text here.",
  "position-classes": "overlay center",
  "bkgd": false,
  "bkgd-color": "",
  "overlay": true,
  "button-class": "primary-cta"
}
  • Content: 
    .hp-banner {
    picture, img {
        display: flex;//fixes gap under it
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .text {
        text-align: center;
        color: $zuccini;
        padding: 2rem 1rem;

        &.bkgd {
            h2, p {
                color: $white;
            }
        }
    }

    h2 {
        font-size: px-to-rem(20px);
        text-transform: uppercase;
    }

    p {
        @include secondary-font(600);
        font-size: px-to-rem(16px);
        line-height: 1.3;
        margin-bottom: px-to-rem(24px);
    }

    .primary-cta {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-sm) {//~475+
        &.overlay {
            .text {
                padding: 2rem 19.59%;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-m) {//~768+
        &.overlay {
            position: relative;

            .text {
                position: absolute;
                top: 50%;
                padding: 1rem;
                background-color: $white;
            }

            &.center {
                .text {
                    left: 50%;
                    width: 61.5%;
                    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
                }
            }

            &.left, &.right {
                .text {
                    display: flex;
                    flex-direction: column;
                    justify-content: center;
                    top: 1rem;
                    width: calc(50% - 1rem);
                    height: calc(100% - 2rem);
                }
            }

            &.left {
                .text {
                    left: 1rem;
                }
            }

            &.right {
                .text {
                    right: 1rem;
                }
            }
        }

        &.left:not(.overlay), &.right:not(.overlay) {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;

            > div {
                width: 50%;
            }
        }

        &.left:not(.overlay) {
            flex-direction: row-reverse;
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-ml) {//~921+
        &.overlay {
            &.center {
                .text {
                    padding: 2rem 4rem;
                }
            }
        }

        &.left, &.right {
            .text {
                padding: 2rem 1rem;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lg) {//~1100+
        &.overlay {
            &.center {
                .text {
                    padding: 2rem 14% 2.5rem 14%;
                }
            }

            &.left, &.right {
                .text {
                    top: 2rem;
                    width: calc(50% - 2rem);
                    height: calc(100% - 4rem);
                    padding: 2rem 2rem 2.5rem 2rem;
                }
            }

            &.left {
                .text {
                    left: 2rem;
                }
            }

            &.right {
                .text {
                    right: 2rem;
                }
            }
        }

        &.left:not(.overlay), &.right:not(.overlay) {
            .text {
                padding: 2rem 4rem 2.5rem 4rem;
            }
        }
    }

    @media ($breakpoint-lxl) {//~1240+
        .text {
            h2 {
                font-size: px-to-rem(28px);
            }

            p {
                font-size: px-to-rem(18px);
                margin-bottom: px-to-rem(32px);
            }
        }
    }

    @media($breakpoint-xl) {//~1300+
        &.overlay {
            &.left, &.right {
                .text {
                    top: 4rem;
                    width: calc(50% - 4rem);
                    height: calc(100% - 8rem);
                }
            }

            &.left {
                .text {
                    left: 4rem;
                }
            }

            &.right {
                .text {
                    right: 4rem;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
